tweets.text: @Parrog3 @AnglianWater @IvelRev @EnvAgency @Parrog3 Hi Ian, we are aware of the burst sewage pipe and have staff on site working to resolve the issue with the water company. Thank you.

2/2 We're following up investigations there today with the @EnvAgencyYNE & are currently cleansing & removing the substance from upstream of the outfall in order to minimise any impact. 

We're very thankful that this was reported to us so that we were able to take swift action.

üá¨üáßüá™üá∫üë©‚ÄçüéìNow available: Talks on #microplastics from @EnvAgency on @PiXLclub. Great resources for teachers planning lessons on #plastic and its impacts on different environments

Nothing as usual.

Get on the trading estate and find out who it is. Fines, closures whatever. It happens 6/7 times a year. https://t.co/Laj9Wo8I62

tweets.text: This is about a lot more than the smell of a landfill. Emissions of hydrogen sulphide are way in excess of WHO guidelines. The @EnvAgency has been slow to act but is now starting to get somewhere. The firm has in the past resorted to threatening local people and the local MP.

We're turning back the clock to make the river Tamar more resilient to climate change. 

Creating a wildlife-rich wetland that will support rare birds and lock up carbon, the project will be supported by @EnvAgency, @NaturalEngland and @PlymUni. https://t.co/sTY835FFUD
@EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK @PHE_uk we have suffered long enough and it is time for immediate critical action @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off https://t.co/YyzkjmZx0P
It‚Äôs not a difficult message @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA Four days & you need to close them down @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/cp9sMUuCEV

Well said - it‚Äôs fetid and people should not be exposed to this utter filth particularly not regularly! @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @ClareDinnisEA @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice @JamesBevanEA #stopthestink @Cap_it_off https://t.co/qODaNZIbAi

tweets.text: Time for @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland to show that people are more important than politics. Good must conquer evil @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/nsWhSXGxny

Thought the impact statements were really powerful and they can‚Äôt be ignored. Would like to see @JamesBevanEA & the @EnvAgency say sorry for the delays in addressing the issue as well as of course putting a stop to it by closing it @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/ZGtbi1bNb1

Well done to everyone who played a part and everyone who turned up on the day. Absolutely brilliant @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/PnSmMnRv4E

Come on @JamesBevanEA We need to see a stop to the harmful landfill gases & we also need to see some accountability from both @RedIndustries2 & the @EnvAgency Cap it & close it. @Cap_it_off Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/PRFsurH4f4

Brilliant peaceful well organised well behaved community protest.We should NEVER have been forced onto the street to beg for fresh air in the 1st place but we can hold our heads high for the dignified manner we did it with. Close them down @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland #stopthestink https://t.co/s7fMfwzcoF

@IvelRev @Parrog3 @NorthHertsDC @EnvAgency Hi there, we appreciate the concern for the stream and our scheduling team and technicians will work with the Council to get this resolved as quickly as possible

@EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA this is what should happen for #walleysquarry. 1/5/21 when Red Industries are found to be still in breach of permit issue immediate closure notice and use their bond to bring in someone who is qualified to shut it down safely @StinkStopthe

@Parrog3 @NorthHertsDC @AnglianWater @EnvAgency This is shocking. This precious chalk stream has looked magnificent in recent months and we have noted a return of many species of wildlife. This sort of spill can jeopardise the recovery.
@NorthHertsDC @AnglianWater @IvelRev @EnvAgency How about getting some tankers in to stop the pollution of our beautiful chalk stream. This was reported at 8.30 apparently!
Cowardice @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @PHE_EoEngland #stopthestink @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe https://t.co/jIsTlZI8vJ
Brilliant turn out @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/YDexaLpJWp
Loud and clear @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @PHE_EoEngland STOP THE STINK! @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/VubwPU7lnC

We will not stop until @RedIndustries2 are removed from the landfill @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA Time for change. Ditch RED and turn Newcastle GREEN again! @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/czbjC0BjoZ

@EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA your answers please? We don't want lip service we want answers & action. @RedIndustries2 are culpable for thousands having new & exacerbated health problems to the point of hospitalisation @PHE_uk This cannot wait @StinkStopthe https://t.co/MnAD7UmCJD
@Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe Signed and shared.
@Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe Signed and shared #cap_it_off #stopthestink

The @PHE_uk cannot interpret data without using the correct parameters and the @EnvAgency data is not precise enough to be used for health trends. Just another red herring? @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off https://t.co/4alcoC7h2v

tweets.text:
‚ö†Ô∏èUPDATE: 

1/2 Yesterday we received reports of a pollution at Horton Burn.

Our technical teams responded and have identified the cause and managed to trace it to a specific area. https://t.co/cRaX2R7Eo0

Horrible scene at the source of the Ivel. Sewage pouring in to our beautiful chalk stream. Sort it out ‚Å¶@AnglianWater‚Å© . We have just got some water back and now this! ‚Å¶@IvelRev‚Å© ‚Å¶@EnvAgency‚Å© ‚Å¶@NorthHertsDC‚Å© https://t.co/UlTpI1QyeW
@WasteCrimeWatch @EnvAgency I saw that, strange one charging for general waste disposal without an outlet?

Loud and clear message from the local councillors. No one minces their words or their desire for the @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA to shut the hell hole down & let us get our lives back @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/XIynGjhvdd

Tick Tock @RedIndustries2 Looking forward to fresh air in 3 days. In the meantime we breathe in the flames from your hell pit landfill. We cant breathe! @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/Gtn257ZCdq

@SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_EoEngland i went on my bike last night. it was lovely riding around audley/scott hay. but as soon as i came back down the a34 towards newcastle i was hit with a wall of stench. i was wheezy all night after. like exercise induced asthma (which Ive never experienced before)
@WasteCrimeWatch @EnvAgency site comes under @NatResWales

urls.title: Diesel leaks into River Wey after 14,000 litres reportedly stolen
urls.description: The environmental impact is being evaluated

tweets.text: Just shocking. Thank you to @EnvAgencySE and @GuildfordBC for the work you're doing to contain the spill and resolve the situation. If close by pls keep an eye out for affected birds and contact @RSPBEngland if you do. Dog walkers should avoid the area. https://t.co/AmbuHb1xMs

Cleveland Fire Brigade, @ClevelandPolice and @EnvAgencyYNE are currently dealing with a incident on Seaton Carew Road, Billingham involving an overturned tanker. The road may be closed for some time we advise motorists to avoid the area and use alternate routes. https://t.co/jiVqZcdS38

We saw you curtain twitching Nigel @RedIndustries2 Too ashamed to face the crowds and say sorry or too arrogant? You can walk away as a more respected man if you face this honestly, say sorry, turn it around & then walk away @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @EnvAgency https://t.co/VSOj9silZX

@EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA  @JamesBevanEA  @AaronBell4NUL  Can anybody justify why Clayton Hall landfill site was closed down with these numbers of complaints, when #WalleysQuarry received 10430 in a recent 6 week period? Plenty more facts where these came from...
#StopTheStink https://t.co/Z0G6tFVYc4

@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @MattHancock You must read the content of the impact statements. We are real people not numbers in a data report. And we need change NOW. Close @RedIndustries2 down @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/eFR7KN25Dy

Here‚Äôs my speech ‚ÄúThe Green Industrial Revolution needs strong Green Industrial Regulation‚Äù from this morning‚Äôs @AldersgateGrp event on ‚ÄúFostering Posterity‚Äù: https://t.co/y08Fb11xSl

#TogetherForOurPlanet #COP26 https://t.co/J6R0P6pYwL

Newcastle under Lyme this morning trying to find a survive the landfill fumes. Westlands honks again, air purifier on over drive & can still smell it, need inhaler. Come on now @JamesBevanEA Close it & prosecute ASAP @PHE_EoEngland   @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/jNGFhLYlly

Some upcoming disruption to the A646 as part of the #Mytholmroyd FAS. To help protect against surface water #flooding - plan your journey & be aware of bus stop temp closures @EnvAgencyYNE @Calderdale https://t.co/NxSC4naIXT

@StinkStopthe 

The letter from the EA to residents is concerning 

"We share the data with PHE, who are experts in interpreting what the data means"

If the EA cant even interpret their own monitoring equipment data, how is the institution going to protect people! 
#Stopthestink
